main.name: Keenan Akit
main.description: I'm an aspiring Product Manager with a background in Business Strategy and Operations and an Engineering Degree. This website serves as a summary of my skills and experiences
main.bio: Hello! I'm currently a junior studying Computer Systems Engineering at Carleton University.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Relevant Coursework: Mathematical Modeling and Computational Methods, Circuits and Signals, Introduction to Finance, Multivariable Calculus, Systems Programming, Computer Science II.
Enrolled in two summers of the Stanford Highschool Summer College Program where I studied subjects such as robotics, systems design, software engineering, and algorithms.

work.title: Strategy & Business Operations Intern
work.description: Launched and executed digital strategy on a brand new vertical increasing reach to over 50,000 newly onboarded merchants known as RitualONE, specifically working on national chains and key accounts.

work.title: Product Analyst
work.description: Led development of a brand new first in industry fan engagement platform (Liquid+), with 1000 new signups in first 15 minutes of announcement and another 5000 on waitlist. https://liquidplus.com

projects.title: COVID-19 Volunteer Database
projects.category: A database of volunteers created at the start of COVID-19 in the GTA
